channel.title: Munki Catalog Browsers Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.2.1
item.description:
1.2.1 (build 69)

  • #9 - Silicon support, from updating LetsMove.framework to 1.25 and Sparkle.framework to 1.24.0.

    • 1.2 (build 67)

  • #10 - Pressing CMD+C when a row is highlighted copies the Munki Name column value for that row
  • #11Leading spaces no longer present in the CSV output
  • #12 CSV output now appended with date and time, for example: Munki Catalog Browser Export - 2020-10-12-03-40-23.csv

  • This release has also been tested under Big Sur b9, with no issues found.

    • 1.1 (build 56)

  • Entering text in search field causes app to crash - #1
  • Main window sizing is unpredictable and not easily modifiable - #3
  • App not usable by non-admin users due to default catalog permissions - #4
  • Search bar does not span whole window - #5
    • 1.0 (build 40)

    Release!

item.title: Version 1.3-beta1
item.description:
1.3-beta1 (build 90)

Changes in this release:

  • Removed the LetsMove framework (to stop the SystemPolicyAppBundle protection being triggered on macOS 13.0+)
  • Updated Sparkle to Sparkle 2
  • Resized the app icon

    • 1.2.2b (build 70) BETA

  • #9 - Silicon support, from updating LetsMove.framework to 1.25 and Sparkle.framework to 1.24.0.

    • 1.2 (build 67)

  • #10 - Pressing CMD+C when a row is highlighted copies the Munki Name column value for that row
  • #11Leading spaces no longer present in the CSV output
  • #12 CSV output now appended with date and time, for example: Munki Catalog Browser Export - 2020-10-12-03-40-23.csv

  • This release has also been tested under Big Sur b9, with no issues found.

    • 1.1 (build 56)

  • Entering text in search field causes app to crash - #1
  • Main window sizing is unpredictable and not easily modifiable - #3
  • App not usable by non-admin users due to default catalog permissions - #4
  • Search bar does not span whole window - #5
    • 1.0 (build 40)

    Release!
